Side Effects: Staring into space weeks after dose is first given. Shoting pain in arm after injection. Don't mix with alcohol!
Comments: I am a big fan of Invega Sustenna however Invega Trinza does not work so well for me and I had horrible withdrawal symptoms leading up to my next shot. I think improvements still need to be made with this medication. It did however help me with some suicidal thoughts.

Side Effects: DO NOT TAKE THIS DRUG!! IT WILL RUIN YOUR LIFE!!
